"@ToskiHero":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54e961076368721750ce0100#post_54e961076368721750ce0100
Honestly I try to avoid thinking like that. Mostly cause I've seen too many jerks who say just that.

Noooooot that the thought doesn't enter my head.



*tries to drink tears*

*underestimates amount of them*

*discovers they are dieing cause of a puddle, in comparison to Star Wars fandom*

*Drowns shamefully*

*death laughs at me*

topics.body:
"@Princess♠Molestia":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54e94c046368727533b10100#post_54e94c046368727533b10100
[bq="Princess♠Molestia"]Welp. I just saw the comments about the upcoming MLP movie.

!http://media.tumblr.com/tumblr_m46hsaFoL41qb9xkb.gif!

I was expecting people to be excited. Man was I wrong. People have been asking for an MLP movie and when one's announced...they just say it's gonna be shit right off the bat?

I honestly don't get it. What am I missing here?[/bq]
Blame that on Disneymaster. That duck had been trying to stir up shit over Twilicorn for awhile now. He's apparently one of those radical "anything after Faust is shit" type of _fan_. Fortunately, he got banned just today.

topics.body:
"@SeraphimDawn":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54e965fd6368720cc19b0000#post_54e965fd6368720cc19b0000
I've said it before. But it's the fact that the site seems to have an atmosphere of near constant criticism and cynicism that bothers me. Partly why I make alot of jokes. Because I don't know if anyone else will. AND it's just fun. 

In hindsight, I probably shouldn't let it get to me caus 1) Doesn't really matter and 2) the opinions of others is none my damn business.


Hmmm.

And to keep this from just me being an angst fest...which I've been doing a bit...hrmmmm

have some Soos!

!https://new4.fjcdn.com/comments/Soos+the+hedgehog+_67da16022e8c7d24e92181a16f9e30c0.png!
